org.apache.lucene.analysis.util

Interface ResourceLoader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClasspathResourceLoader, FilesystemResourceLoader

    public interface ResourceLoader
    Abstraction for loading resources (streams, files, and classes).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> Class<? extends T> findClass(String cname, Class<T> expectedType)
      Finds class of the name and expected type
      <T> T newInstance(String cname, Class<T> expectedType)
      Creates an instance of the name and expected type
      InputStream openResource(String resource)
      Opens a named resource
